message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $18000. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product you're selling, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we possibly negotiate the price down to $16000?

Bob, I understand your budget concerns. While I value the product highly, I'm willing to come down a bit to $17000. This would still give me a good return while being within a reasonable range for you. What do you say?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Would it be possible to consider $16500 as a compromise?
